section.name: Spring Configuration
section.p: In order to use the annotations in this package, you'll need the following elements in your spring configuration, which will trigger the setup of the caching interceptors around your annotated methods:
The "config" element in this project's namespace (ehcache in the example above) supports the following attributes:

ul.li: 'createMissingCaches' - This value is a boolean that gets passed into the CacheManager#setCreateCaches method, default value is false.

section.p: Be sure to create an ehcache.xml file at the root of the classpath - Ehcache Configuration.
